name: dribdat
description: An open source platform for data-driven team collaboration, such as Hackathons.

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py db init && python manage.py db migrate && python manage.py db upgrade

DRIBDAT_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies

DRIBDAT_APIKEY.description: A secret key for connecting remote clients through the API

DRIBDAT_ENV.description: 'dev' to enable debugging, 'prod' to optimise assets
